messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3620
messages.msgSnippet: I m on the second tape of It s Only Too Late If You Don t Start Now. It s pretty good. I wish Wishcraft was on Book on Tape. I seem to get through those
messages.messageBody:
I'm on the second tape of "It's Only Too Late If You Don't Start Now.
It's pretty good. I wish "Wishcraft" was on Book on Tape. I seem to get
through those easier and faster. Too many distractions. LOL! I bought me a
copy so I would be able to finish it and pass it around our family. :-)


Barb E
"The beginning is the most important part of the work."

- Plato, Philosopher
